short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See randomly selected bookmarks from your history on new tab. Rediscover websites that you bookmarked in the past and get surprised.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This simple extension is for you if you bookmark a lot of web pages to visit them later but often forget about them or don't get the time. It reminds you of websites you have bookmarked in the past by showing 3 randomly selected bookmarks from the history on every new tab. It also shows the folder in which the link was saved.
Please leave feedback if you find it useful or have suggestions for improvement :)
